__e: Once we lock on to Tom's signal, we're going to need you to tell us what memory he's in, and tell him to stay there.
Look, I need to warn you that I'm here, that I came to you because I need a favor, and it's a big one.
But I must warn you that I left a letter with one of my friends and, if I don't get back to his place before midnight, he'll take it to the police.
You can just him know that we're here, please.
I warn you that what I'm asking might be dangerous.
Okay, just please let me talk to my dad and let him know that I'm okay.
